items.name: Bacon cheese burger
items.clue: it says '100% vegan' on the wrapper.

items.name: Magic bagel
items.clue: has the name 'Javi' written on the wrapper.

items.name: Barlton's ancient sword
items.clue: Barlton won't be needing this anymore.

items.name: Filth Filled Boots
items.clue: Why am I even putting these on?

items.name: a human ribcage
items.clue: It still has bits of person on it, but it will make a good chest plate

items.name: Nothing
items.clue: a big ol' bunch of nothing

items.name: some leaves
items.clue: You could pick this up, but why?

characters.name: Dave the Cave Explorer
characters.story: Dave decided to go searching for caves, as he loves to explore them in his free time.

characters.name: Gramantha
characters.story: Once an heiress to a whipcream empire, Gramantha turned her back on her privellage and decided to explore caves or something.

characters.name: Lil Lost Timmy
characters.story: He's little. He's lost. He's Timmy.

characters.name: Larry the Woodsman
characters.story: A large barrel chested man whos only love is the forest and his dog Juniper. He also likes caves.

characters.name: Cave Dweller
characters.story: You hear a strange sound, much like a child whimpering, or screaming. You don't really know, but it's getting closer.

characters.name: Facebat
characters.story: You hear an undeniable sound, screeching, it's definitely a facebat!

characters.name: Cave Gnome
characters.story: You feel a strange sensation on your leg, almost as if a tiny dog brushed your ankles, but then you notice a tiny human-like face, with a dumb pointy hat, Watch out! It's a cave gnome!

characters.name: Chorgoth the Cave Hippo
characters.story: The ground rumbles...It's getting closer..Is it? It can't be...It's Chorgoth the Cave Hippo. He's large and in charge! Prepare for battle!

characters.name: Ghost of a dead miner
characters.story: The hairs on the back of your neck stand on end as you hear the faint sound of a swinging metal lantern, you feel cold. Ready yourself! It's a ghost!

characters.name: Barlton the mage
characters.story: A strange man with what appears to be a magical wooden staff approaches you, You sense that he means you no harm

caves.search: Look for useful items near the entrance
caves.name: Cave Entrance
caves.story: Walking through the forest you see a giant dark cave entrance:

caves.name: Skeleton room
caves.story: As you enter the tunnel you come across a skeleton next to a backpack:

caves.name: A dark room
caves.story: As you walk through this side of the cave you are enveloped in pure darkness, all you can see is something shiny in the distance

caves.name: Strange nest
caves.story: You come across what appears to be some kind of nesting ground for an unspeakable creature.

caves.name: Treasure room
caves.story: The sound of dripping water catches your attention, but even more exciting is the sight of a strange chest halfway submerged in a shallow pool.

caves.name: Squishy room
caves.story: It stinks... really bad. The floor is sticky and mushy. You see something sticking out of this disgusting substance.

caves.name: Underground deluge
caves.story: You come across a large underground waterfall, It appears to be a dead end but you feel a breeze coming from the direction of the waterfall

caves.name: Underground pirate ship (#notgoonies)
caves.story: You find an enourmous cavern housing a pirate ship, but defiintely not like the one from the Goonies, its totally different than that.

caves.name: Cave hippo chamber
caves.story: Something is sleeping... something big, you wish you brought extra underwear.
